sentences.sContent: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.sCn: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。
熊猫以及其他濒危物种

sentences.sContent: ...300 species of fish and 700 species of coral...
...Qinghai lake offers many species an intermediate stop during their migration...
...Humans are the ultimate invasive species — when they move into new territory...
...the area of the Amazon rain forest has been dwindling year by year and many species there are endangered...
...The more evidence we collect that our species is capable of greatness...
...must imagine intensely and comprehensively; he must put himself in the place of another and of many others; the pains and pleasures of his species must become his own...
...and a report by the Fish and Wildlife Service showed a worrisome drop in the populations of several species of North Atlantic turtles...

trans.tranOther: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants
